import org.apache.spark.ml.{Pipeline, PipelineModel}

val movies1 = spark.read.parquet("/home/eduuser/data/movies1.parquet").persist
val Array(train, test) = movies1.randomSplit(Array(0.8, 0.2), seed = 12345)
val featureExtractor = PipelineModel.load("/home/eduuser/model/feature_extractor")
val trainFeature = featureExtractor.transform(train)
val testFeature = featureExtractor.transform(test)
trainFeature.createOrReplaceTempView("train_feature")
